dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of Eridoria. I'm your guide on this journey.

dialogues.speaker: NPC - Old Man
dialogues.text: Ah, you must be the brave adventurer we've heard so much about. What brings you to these lands?

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I'm searching for a way to defeat the Dark Sorcerer who has been terrorizing our kingdom.

dialogues.speaker: NPC - Old Man
dialogues.text: Ah, you mean Xandros. A dark and powerful foe indeed. But I think I can help you with that. Follow me.
